intro: Our goal is to provide you with clear, trusted information so that you can make informed decisions and help stop the pandemic. Data is just one piece of the equation. Here you will find essential information that will help you understand, interpret, and apply the data on our site:
metadataTitle: COVID-19 Essential Information & Resources - Covid Act Now
metadataDescription: Find recent and trusted information & resources about the novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV). Learn about Symptoms, Tests, Risks, and more. Backed by medical experts. Make informed decisions to stop the disease for you and your community.

sections.description: R₀ vs R(t) vs Infection rate: We have compiled a simple glossary of essential COVID-related terms, which we will continue to update and expand.

We’ve received tons of questions from our users ranging from "how do I talk to people who behave in ways I disagree with?" to "what types of masks work better than others?" Here we address more than 40 of our top questions.

What exactly does it mean to make “data-informed decisions?” Let our partners show you. Since March, hundreds of individuals, businesses, community leaders, and policy makers have used data in their strategic and day-to-day response to the pandemic. In our case studies, you’ll learn how different people are making decisions for themselves, their organizations, and their communities during COVID.
